titleStmt.title: A Brief abstract and narrative of the several spoils, depredations, losses and damages, suffered by Sir William Courten, Sir Paul Pyndar, and William Courten Esq.; deceased, annexed to a petition of the proprietors and creditors, depending in Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Courten, William, Sir, 1572-1636.
Pindar, Paul, Sir, 1565 or 6-1650.
Courten, William, d. 1655.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
